Title: Until You're Blue
Writer: Ray McKinnon (created by), Victoria Morrow, Scott Teems, Chad Feehan (executive story editor)
Actors: Aden Young, Abigail Spencer, J. Smith-Cameron, Adelaide Clemens
Plot: Daniel considers his future as he faces a difficult decision. Amantha lets off some steam. Ted, Jr. is frustrated by recent events, while Tawney makes plans. Sheriff Daggett visits Benji Melton. Ted, Sr. takes steps to protect his family.
